idea:
The world is aware of the effects of global warming and resource exhaustion. Clean and Green Energy is the need of the hour. Our Management, with a view to contribute its share, has tried to work in the field of renewable energy. This venture will help in promoting green and renewable energy in order to help in reducing the problems associated with energy consumption and the greenhouse effect. We provide safe, reliable, and clean energy, which will benefit our world and our children.
By considering the climatic conditions of Maharashtra, it is very much favourable for harnessing of solar energy. As per survey by our business development team, we have found huge potential for the solar energy segment as well as combination of energy storage system based on solar energy. We have the world class technology, products and solutions for MW scale Solar PV Projects & Roof Top Grid & off Grid Connected projects in association with our technology partners and manufacturers from USA and Europe.
Sources of Competencies
Expertise in Planning, Designing and implementing cost effective energy solutions Expertise in Electrical Engineering
Project Management & Execution : Bankable Solar Project
Techno economic pre-feasibility and feasibility studies, executive design
Value Engineering & Localization : Cost Optimization
Adoption of latest globally recognized technologies – Systems, processes & ERP
name: Abner Power Energy Private Limited

idea:
Express yourself strives to create a world where mental healthcare needs for everyone is timely met and is supported by an inclusive society. Our objective is to provide awareness and support in getting the right treatment at the right time.


At express yourself we believe mental health is as important as physical health and providing an end to end solution for all your mental healthcare needs is paramount. We are providing you with a medium to connect with the experts, get educated and receive the desired treatment all while maintaining your anonymity.
name: Express Yourself

idea:
Vision:  To be recognized as a leading organization that addresses various problems faced by the society related to Healthcare through design, development and supply of Quality products.  

Mission

• To offer innovative solutions to nutraceuticals, herbals, pharmaceuticals, cosmeceuticals, personal care products, medical devices, diagnostics sectors.

• End to end product development including Concept-Design-Process-Packaging

• Inculcate and deliver ‘Quality’ by - Design, Testing and Compliances

• Strategic Commercialization to reach out to the society
name: ARQ Solution LLP

idea: Our moto is to reduce dependency of electricity on non renewable energy sources, give sustainable energy to country and people.
